channel.title: Is this a decent starter VPS?
channel.description:
So yeah, I were thinking of buying a VPS, it's much more convenient than having to run the computer 24/7. I found this kinda cheap one but I got no experience of VPS's whatsoever, can someone tell me if this is good or bad, it doesn't have to be the best since I don't have that many players at the moment, but a decent one for no lagg.
OS: Windows 2008 Web Edition 64-bit Processor: 2.4 GHz Xeon RAM Memory: 384 MB Storage: 15GB
Transport, Internet and infrastructure Traffic Transfer: 100 Mbit internet, traffic 150Gb/Month Own IP Address: 1, more optional Firewall: Optional Antispam: Optional SLA: Daytime - can be upgraded Snapshots: Yes, 1 Each
Backup Backup: Yes

item.title: Is this a decent starter VPS?
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

DraculeMihawk:

Yeah should run 30-60 players no lag.

I lol’d.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this a decent starter VPS?
